message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product! I can do a bit better than that.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $130 and $145. How about $137.50?
I can see you're serious about the product! I can do a bit better than $137.50, but not too much more.
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit short. How about $139.50?
I can see you're really interested in the product! I'm getting close to my minimum, but I'm willing to make one more concession.
I'm really close, but I think I can get a better deal. How about $143?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $145, that's my minimum price. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your minimum price, but I'm still not comfortable going that high. I'll meet you halfway between $143 and $145. How about $144?
